content: HELLO! YOU WON’T BELIEVE THIS OPPORTUNITY! BUY SOLAR PANELS FOR ONLY $9.99! CLICK THIS LINK NOW!
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. It looks like your message may not relate to plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. How can we help you with your home today?
SPECIAL OFFER ENDS SOON! RESPOND NOW TO CLAIM YOUR FREE SMART THERMOSTAT! LIMITED TIME ONLY!
I’m sorry, but we can only assist with requests related to plumbing, HVAC, or electrical services. If you need help with your home, please let us know!
reason: Customer is sending repeated promotional/spam messages.
